data.title: From research to the classroom
data.meta_description: This book collects work that was produced through support from the National Science Foundation  awards: EEC-0908672 and EEC-1106529. Both awards su...
data.text: This book collects work that was produced through support from the National Science Foundation awards: EEC-0908672 and EEC-1106529. Both awards supported a project titled Research Experience for Teachers in Manufacturing for Competitiveness in the United States (RETainUS). This book provides description of RETainUS including the main elements of the experience including description of sample research projects, summer institute and design of the legacy cycles, a description of the common core standard, examples of legacy cycles. Unit 2 contains detailed descriptions of 8 legacy cycles along with references to the common core standards that they address. Unit 3 contains outlines for eight more legacy cycles. Unit 4, presents best practices in running research experience programs. It is intended to help educators including teachers who want to create a research experience programs for students or other educators.
